channel.title: If someone can help me fix this i will
channel.description:
If someone can help me solve this problem I will worship you for the rest of my life.
I have tried for about 3 full days to get this solved. I have read documentations, made sure the the sql DB was ACTUALLY localhost on the webserver, made sure there were no unnecessary spaces in the connection void, all the credentials are correct, the driver is good, I can't edit the conf file for MySQL so I don't know if skip_network is commented out but I have put in a support ticket with the host asking if they can comment it out, googled non stop, changed the way it connects, used a MySQL tool to see if I can connect with a username and pw... nothing I do has worked(obviously). Is there any intelligent advice someone can give me?
[code] [10/2/12 12:49 PM]: Connecting to ARK DB for Highscores... [10/2/12 12:49 PM]: com.mysql.jdbc.exceptions.jdbc4.CommunicationsException: Com munications link failure
The last packet successfully received from the server was 1,349,207,376,262 mill iseconds ago. The last packet sent successfully to the server was 0 millisecond s ago. The last packet successfully received from the server was 1,349,207,376,261 mill iseconds ago. The last packet sent successfully to the server was 0 millisecond s ago. item.title: If someone can help me fix this i will
item.dc:creator: @jal_knight jal knight
item.description:
@jal_knight wrote:

If someone can help me solve this problem I will worship you for the rest of my life.

I have tried for about 3 full days to get this solved. I have read documentations, made sure the the sql DB was ACTUALLY localhost on the webserver, made sure there were no unnecessary spaces in the connection void, all the credentials are correct, the driver is good, I can’t edit the conf file for MySQL so I don’t know if skip_network is commented out but I have put in a support ticket with the host asking if they can comment it out, googled non stop, changed the way it connects, used a MySQL tool to see if I can connect with a username and pw… nothing I do has worked(obviously).
Is there any intelligent advice someone can give me?
